skills.name: Cascading Laceration
skills.desc: Deals massive Ice DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Rapturous Wind
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Swallow Return
skills.desc: Summons 4 Flying Swords and gains the Sword Formation effect. Sword Formation increases Yanqing's SPD and applies Formation Core to the Flying Swords.

skills.name: Ironthorn
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Freeze the target.

skills.name: Ballad of Formation Breaker
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Qi Advance
skills.desc: Enters the Charge state. Cast Cascading Laceration on all targets in the next action.
